creator: zxq@asiainfo.com
text:
the pc is behinde a firewall and use an http proxy on port 8080 with user name
and password protection, how to configure scrape to use the proxy to get the 
page

creator: rich@more.net
text:
With this fix it does do redirects, and it should honor the proxy settings (I
have no way to test this).

The taglib has been updated to scrape through a proxy, check the docs for
configuration.  Will be in the nightly builds.
creator: rich@more.net
